What I Treat

Integrating AI movement analysis and advanced therapy tools for precise, personalized recovery.

Plantar Fasciitis

Persistent heel pain affects walking and standing. My approach uses AI-driven gait/movement analysis, advanced soft tissue therapy, and targeted mobility retraining to restore comfort and function.

Chronic Back Pain

Limiting your activity and quality of life? Combining real-time movement evaluation, muscle activation technology, and hands-on/manual therapy, I help address the true cause and guide you through functional, pain-free movement.

Achilles Tendinitis

AI-assisted movement screening finds overload patterns. Treatment includes personalized exercise correction, tendon load management, and device-assisted recovery for faster and safer return to activity.

Tennis Elbow (Lateral Epicondylitis)

Elbow pain from work or sports? I use precise motion analysis and customized loading strategies to relieve pain, support tendon healing, and improve grip strength.

Calcific Tendonitis

Advanced imaging and movement evaluation help pinpoint restrictions. Care blends manual therapy, AI-guided rehab, and progressive loading for long-term relief.

Sports Injuries

From strains to sprains, I offer high-tech assessment and recovery protocols to restore strength, mobility, and confidence, helping you safely return to your sport.

Shoulder Pain (Rotator Cuff)

Using AI posture analysis and individualized exercise therapy, I target movement dysfunctions, reduce pain, and promote optimal shoulder mobility.

Muscle Recovery & Fatigue

Whether from intense training or daily stress, I use advanced recovery technologies and movement optimization to help your muscles recover faster and perform better.

Ready to Start Your Recovery?

Don't let pain hold you back. Get personalized treatment that combines the latest technology with expert care.
